channel.title: How to get pk?
channel.description: how do i get a pk system, like where u kill seomone u get 2 points, and u can use your points to buy items

item.title: How to get pk?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Zezerex, post:3, topic:286744”][quote author=HiddenPker link=topic=379206.msg2851863#msg2851863 date=1246578200]
stop asking for this search it we aint a spoon feeding community.
[/quote]stop giving pointless answers like that[/quote]
Its not really pointless, but in another sence it is. he did nothing, but hes trying to get you to look.
ONTOPIC - try grabbing the one from reapagescape v2, i did. It works so that if the player you killed is same combat… u get 2 poitns… higher combat is 3 and lower combat is 1. you will need to add things to save this, but for the main system use reapage scape v2’s
